mapper.select: SELECT GOODS_KEYWORD_NO ,GOODS_ID ,KEYWORD_NM FROM STN_GOODS_KEYWORD WHERE GOODS_ID = #{goodsId}

SELECT KEYWORD_NM ,CNT FROM ( SELECT k.KEYWORD_NM ,COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM STN_GOODS g JOIN STN_PRTNR_CMPNY_MAPNG pcm ON pcm.PCMAPNG_ID = g.PCMAPNG_ID AND pcm.USE_AT = 'Y' JOIN STN_CMPNY c ON c.CMPNY_ID = pcm.CMPNY_ID AND c.USE_AT='Y' JOIN STN_GOODS_KEYWORD k ON k.GOODS_ID = g.GOODS_ID
AND (
( g.MODEL_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{item}, '%') OR g.GOODS_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{item}, '%') OR c.CMPNY_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{item}, '%') )
)
AND 1 = 2
GROUP BY KEYWORD_NM ) t ORDER BY CNT DESC LIMIT 5
